  2. A Teen in Love With a Chatbot Killed Himself. Can the Chatbot Be Held Responsible?  The New York Times
  3. Opinion | No, That AI Chatbot Is Not Your Friend  MedPage Today
  4. OpenAI estimates how many ChatGPT users show signs of 'mental health emergencies'  businessinsider.com
  5. OpenAI says over a million people talk to ChatGPT about suicide weekly  TechCrunch
